ERROR.NODE_NOT_FOUND: The node could not be found on the server, a reboot can fix that issue!
ERROR.CLOUD_CONNECTION_INVALID: Cloud connection invalid! You need to enter a API key.
ERROR.DOCKER_NOT_RUN_BY_SUPERVISOR: Docker image cannot be automatically updated! This can only be done when hosted by our supervisor!
ERROR.SERVER_NOT_AVAILABLE: The server is not available at the moment, please try again later!
